name: Mike in The Shadow Realm
description:
Exam game.

Guide Mike through the Shadow Realm by directing him to the portal. Use buttons at the bottom of the screen to move Mike right and left. The up arrow commands Mike to jump and X tells him to stop.

If you run out of lives, press ESC to restart from the beginning.

Features implemented:

  • All core functionality.
  • All extra functionality except sound effects.
  • All user interface functionality.
  • 10 levels implemented with all functionality.

References:

  • 8x8 Tileset: https://opengameart.org/content/deep-night-8x8-platformer-assets
  • Ghost Shadow font: https://www.dafont.com/imagex.d2938?page=3
  • Shorelines font: https://www.dafont.com/shorelines-script.font
  • Kanit font: https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Kanit?query=kanit
